game.title: The Missing Dog
game.objective: Find the missing dog and return it to its owner.
game.description: A local farmer's dog has gone missing. The farmer is worried sick and has asked you to help find it.
game.reward: The farmer will give you a reward of 100 gold if you find his dog.

task.objective: Talk to the farmer and get more information about the missing dog.
task.description: Visit Farmer John at his farm to gather more information about the dog's disappearance. He may be able to give you some clues about where the dog might be.

task.objective: Search the area around the farm for any signs of the missing dog.
task.description: Look for footprints, fur, or other evidence that may indicate the dog's whereabouts.

task.objective: Ask around the village to see if anyone has seen the missing dog.
task.description: Talk to the villagers and inquire about the missing dog. They might have seen the dog or have heard something about its disappearance.

task.objective: Follow the clues to find the missing dog.
task.description: Use the information you've gathered to locate the missing dog. It could be hiding somewhere nearby or have wandered off farther away.

task.objective: Return the dog to the farmer.
task.description: Once you've found the missing dog, take it back to Farmer John. He'll be overjoyed to see his beloved pet again.
